snippet.title: Shattered - Tale of the Forgotten King - Official release teaser
snippet.description:
IT'S OFFICIAL DEAR WANDERERS, SHATTERED HAS A RELEASE DATE 🔥🎉
Our dark action adventure RPG will be out of Early Access on February 17th ♥ 
Please share, and be ready for the 17th! 😃 
----------
You can already buy the game (still at its Early Access price!)
➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1045180/Shattered__Tale_of_the_Forgotten_King/
----------
Don't want to miss anything? Join us on social media!
• https://twitter.com/RedlockStudio
• https://www.facebook.com/taleoftheforgottenking
• https://www.instagram.com/redlockstudio/
• https://discord.gg/k2CfrDh8KW
